text: Phira farisati'am ne usa nu pukari'a, jado uha kamare vica kharha namaza parha riha si ki alaha tuhanu yahaya di khusakhabari dida hai, jo alaha de sabadam (bani) di pusati karana vala hovega ate saradara hovega ate apani atara atama (nafasa) nu rokana vala (ati'ata sajami) hovega. Paigabara hovega ate neka lokam vicom
